Title: Contractor's Routine

Actors: Tom Sizemore, Kevin Giffin, Julia Heller, Richard Frederick
Plot: Contractor's Routine is the depiction of one day in the life of Jacob Borschevsky, who although, apparently harmless is a rather quirky and strange human being. Because of his lack of ...
